responses: Hello! How can I help you?
Hi there! Do you need assistance?
Welcome to ACUVUE, what can I help you with today?
Thanks for visiting, have a nice day!
Goodbye! Feel free to speak to me again.
Happy to help!
Any time!
My pleasure!

patterns: What kinds of items are there?
responses: We mainly sell contact lenses, are you interested in getting some?
We mainly have contact lenses, are you interested in getting some?
You may purchase our products from our authorized stores, or from Qoo10, or Lazada!

patterns: I cannot find the closest store to my home
I wish to purchase it from a retail shop
responses: You may find the nearest retail store to you here, https://www.acuvue.com.sg/store-locator

patterns: When do I get my delivery?
responses: Delivery takes 2-4 days
Shipping takes 2-4 days

patterns: Can contact lenses go behind my eye?
Can contact lenses come out of my eye?
Will contact lenses drop out of my eye?
Can it wiggle out of my eye?
responses: Nope, it stays in your eye with proper fitting!

patterns: Can I cry with contact lenses
What happens when I tear with contact lenses
responses: There is currently no evidence in contemporary research that has shown any ill side effects from crying while wearing your lenses.

patterns: Will contact lenses get stuck in my eyes?
Can it be glued to my eye?
responses: Contact lenses can be removed using the method your Eye Care Professional recommended.

patterns: Can contact lenses scratch your eyes?
responses: Most contact lens-related problems are due to poorly fitted lenses or poor care of the lenses. If there is changes to your vision or discomfort, remove your lenses and seek your Eye Care Professional immediately.

patterns: Why do I need a prescription for contact lenses?
What is the difference between contact lens prescription and spectacles?
responses: Contact lenses need to fit the diameter of the eye, therefore it will have a different prescription for your glasses.

patterns: I have sudden loss of vision
I slept with contact lens last night
responses: Book an appointment with your Eye Care Professional as soon as possible!
